content: note this is for the pin for love mini bubus this will not fit the regular bubus this is a quick little knit made to fit bag charms eg the pin for love size labubus this is knitted in one piece in the round on dpns starting at the bottom and working up to the top of the hood skills needed are knitting in the round and wrap & turn short row pattern includes links to helpful youtube demonstrations of the short row technique i realize i did not include instructions for the pompom in the pattern it s a simple pompom then you just tie it onto the front of the hood just in front of the top opening you could also add a fun button or bead or just leave it plain disclaimer i am not an experienced pattern designer this was something i worked out off the top of my head i then duplicated it and wrote down my process this pattern is being offered for free feel free to make as many of these as you d like and pass them around to your bubu loving friends please do not sell items made from this pattern i have no claim to this ip i m simply a fan
